column1: 2.1 - PREDEFINED LEGEND POSITION WITH CHART TITLE (shapes on the charts: red = inner plot area, blue = outer plot area, green = legend, yellow = title and legend space)
2.2 - PREDEFINED LEGEND POSITION WITHOUT CHART TITLE (shapes on the charts: red = inner plot area, blue = outer plot area, green = legend, yellow = legend space)
2.3 - MANUAL LEGEND POSITION, MOVED FROM RIGHT (shapes on the charts: red = inner plot area, blue = outer plot area, green = legend, yellow = legend space)
2.4 - MANUAL LEGEND POSITION, MOVED FROM BOTTOM (shapes on the charts: red = inner plot area, blue = outer plot area, green = legend, yellow = legend space)
